definition: clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means

pinyin: ke4 hu4 fu2 wu4 qi4 jie2 gou4
ke4 hu4 ji1 fu2 wu4 qi4 huan2 jing4
guang3 bo1 he2 wei4 zhi1 fu2 wu4 qi4

sentences.english: The remote search server is a single point of failure.
sentences.chinese: 远程搜索服务器是一个单点故障点。

sentences.english: With BladeSystem, server organization is not tied to function.
sentences.chinese: 随着刀片服务器组织无关的功能。

sentences.english: Sends the encrypted session key to the server.
sentences.chinese: 将加密的会话密钥发送给服务器。

sentences.english: Event throughput is bound by the server speed.
sentences.chinese: 事件吞吐量受服务器的速度限制。

sentences.english: Both servers are running with one partition only.
sentences.chinese: 这两台服务器都只以一个分区运行。

sentences.english: This link represents the network access that the server provides to the virtual system.
sentences.chinese: 该链接代表了服务器提供给虚拟机系统的网络访问。

sentences.english: Open Source "Social App Server" Might Crack Garden Walls?
sentences.chinese: 开源“社交应用服务器”有可能推倒那些“院墙”？

sentences.english: Enable logons to the data store server.
sentences.chinese: 启用登陆到数据存储服务器。

sentences.english: Understanding the deployment environment currently in place with the other application server is valuable.
sentences.chinese: 理解另一个应用服务器的当前部署环境是有价值的。

sentences.english: Tenants share the operating system and servers.
sentences.chinese: 租户共享操作系统和服务器。

sentences.english: I instrumented the server source code to obtain the packets scanned counter.
sentences.chinese: 我测试了服务器的源代码以获得扫描包的计数器。

sentences.english: Tests can then be deployed to the integrated test server and executed.
sentences.chinese: 然后可以将测试部署到集成测试服务器并执行。

sentences.english: The executable that is hand-loaded and executed by the Kernel, namely the file server.
sentences.chinese: 手动载入并由内核执行的可执行体，即文件服务器。

sentences.english: This can directly affect your call quality and processing power of your server.
sentences.chinese: 这会直接影响你的通话质量和你的服务器的处理能力。

sentences.english: Sends no request to the server.
sentences.chinese: 没有向服务器发送任何请求。

sentences.english: If the server hasn't been started, this option will be grayed out.
sentences.chinese: 如果该服务器尚未启动，该此选项将显示为灰色。

definition: to crash (of a computer)/Taiwanese term for 當機|当机[dang4 ji1]
main engine/(military) lead aircraft/(computing) host computer/main processor/server
network router/gateway (to Internet or between networks)
